strings: You don't have any companions at the moment.
You can't confer with your fellow party members at the moment.
You aren't able to look at your battle records at the moment.
Heal entire party's HP as efficiently as possible.
Specify party members' strategies for fighting monsters.
Allocate skill points party members have earnt but not yet assigned to a skill.
Position party members for battle. The further back, the lower the chance of being hit.
Adjust the volume of the background music, sound effects and voices of game characters. Viewpoint settings are also found here.
Flick through photographs taken on your travels.
Look at postcards exchanged via StreetPass.
Review photographic challenges set by Cameron Obscura.
Acquire bonus items via the Internet.
Cook up a new item in the alchemy pot by combining ingredient items.
Change the composition of your monster team.
Save your progress and take a break from your quest.
You cannot change party order at the moment.
You cannot access the StreetPass ‘Hot Shots’ screen at the moment.
You cannot download any bonus items at the moment.

The alchemy pot is in the wagon.
You cannot use it from here.
You cannot take a break from your quest at this moment.
On the StreetPass ‘Hot Shots’ screen, you can make postcards out of photos you've taken, autograph them, and exchange them with other players.
By swapping postcards, you can get bonus items to help you on your quest and unlock more photo embellishing options.
And with an Internet connection, you can exchange postcards with other players around the world, too.
In order to swap postcards online, you need to be connected to the DQ8 members' site, for which you will need to upload your saved game data.
Browse the photo album to see the photographs you've taken in the game, and to embellish them with stickers and frames.
The Bonus Items screen lets you connect to the Internet to receive bonus items.
In order to go online, you need to be connected to the DQ8 members' site, for which you will need to upload your saved game data.
There are photographs you have taken on the SD card. Turn one of them into a postcard?
You cannot remove <hero> from the line-up.
You cannot alter the line-up because there are no living party members!
Red cannot lead the party here.
Morrie cannot lead the party here.
You have no skill points to allocate!
No. of turns team will stay in battle:
No. of times called into battle:
Place all items except those currently equipped in the bag?
All items except those currently equipped are placed in the bag.
Sort contents of bag by type?
The bag's contents have been sorted.
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> tries to use <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0> as a tool...
<Cap><character> must be level <value> or above to equip <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0>.
<Cap><DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0> is cursed and cannot be removed!

You can't discard that!
It's too important!
If you discard <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0> now, you won't be able to obtain it again. Are you sure?
<Cap><character_0> has fallen in battle and cannot use <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0>.
A sea route glows brightly on the map.
The Darktree leaf moves to show the location of a force of evil.
But the Darktree leaf slides straight off the map.
As slimy as a Casanova, and all over you just as quickly!
Walks all over foes like a centipede in stilettos!
Like a wriggling plate of spaghetti tossed in your face!
Spotted on a river bank near Maella Abbey.
Spotted at the water's edge near a lady bandit's lair.
Not a bad slime... A REALLY bad slime!
A naughty boy who likes to get his feet wet.
All trace of any monsters in this area seems to have disappeared!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> now has such a teratoid whiff, that no monsters notice <IF_SOLO><IF_ACTOR_M>his<IF_ACTOR_F>her<IF_ACTOR_N>its<ENDIF_ACTOR_MFN><ELSE_NOT_SOLO>the party's<ENDIF_SOLO> presence.
The metal's brilliance is dazzling and its weight strangely reassuring.
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> quietly slips the mini medal back to ease <IF_ACTOR_M>his<IF_ACTOR_F>her<IF_ACTOR_N>its<ENDIF_ACTOR_MFN> guilty conscience.
But nothing appears in the crystal ball.
The bag is tied tightly shut.
‘I don't know who will find this letter.
‘But please consider it my last will and testament. For by the time you read this, I will already be gone.
‘I am going to the tower in the east. I will not return until my brother's death is avenged.
‘Mother, I'm sorry for the damage I've caused to our family's reputation. But this is about something far bigger than tradition.
‘I must follow my heart, no matter the consequences. Please forgive me.
‘And to Bangerz and Mash, I'm sorry for lying to you. I hope you'll forgive me as well.\nSigned,\nJessica’
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> picks up <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0> and has a good look.
But <DEF_ART_ACTOR> doesn't know how to play the harp!\n<IF_ACTOR_M>He<IF_ACTOR_F>She<IF_ACTOR_N>It<ENDIF_ACTOR_MFN> puts it away quietly.
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> picks up <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0> and has a good look.
The phial contains a beautiful, sparkling powder of some kind.
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> uses the lizard humour to cover the party's scent.
The scent of lizard fills the air!
It feels hard and rough to the touch.
It feels rough to the touch, but strangely pleasing at the same time.
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR>'s face is reflected on its surface.
The surface of the mirror gleams with a gorgeous lustre. It's so bright that <DEF_ART_ACTOR> has to look away.
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> picks up <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0> and has a good look.
They're so beautiful that <DEF_ART_ACTOR> can't look away.
But it's too difficult for <DEF_ART_ACTOR> to understand.
Marta's bag is fastened tightly shut. Better not open it.
Thief's key recipe<:> Combine an iron nail and a bronze knife.
<Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
Thief's Key <equal> Iron Nail + Bronze Knife.
Thief's key recipe<:> Combine an iron nail and a bronze knife.
You will need a device called an ‘alchemy pot’ to combine the items.
Eros' bow recipe<:> Combine a hunter's bow and a certain item.
The ‘certain item’ is something that makes you happy simply by looking at it.
<Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
Imp knife recipe<:> Combine an assassin's dagger with an impishly evil item.
Imp knives are said to drain an enemy's MP with each slice.
<Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
Imp knife <equal> Assassin's Dagger + Devil's Tail
Dragon slayer recipe<:> You can improve a dragonsbane by combining it with some form of bracer.
This is said to make the dragonsbane better than new and far stronger.
<Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
Now any treasure chest that this key fits can be opened!
Now any treasure chest that this key fits can be opened!
Now almost any treasure chest or door can be opened!
The gorgeous ring features the crest of the Templar knights.
The ring is engraved, ‘From Eltrio to Xia, with love’.
The ring of a Templar knight, engraved with a religious emblem.
The echoes resonate in response to the echo flute!
For the next ten battles, the party will earn double experience points and gold!
For the next thirty battles, the party will earn double experience points and gold!
<Cap><character_2> takes <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0> from <character_0> and gives it to <character_1>.
<Cap><character_2> takes <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0> from <character_0> and puts <IF_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_0>them<ELSE_NOT_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_0>it<ENDIF_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_0> in the bag.
<Cap><character_2> takes <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0> out of the bag and gives it to <character_1>.
<Cap><character_0> has fallen in battle and cannot cast any spells.
You cannot make a quick save log here.
If you want to take a break from playing immediately, just enter Sleep Mode.
You can resume your quest simply by leaving Sleep Mode. Just be careful not to let the battery discharge fully.

You acquired a very special postcard, which earns you <INDEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0>!
Give someone's postcard a thumbs-up, and next time you encounter that person via StreetPass, he or she will be able to give you a thumbs-up back again!
If you add a sender to your blocked<->user list, you will no longer receive any postcards from that person.
This feature is not available because Sharing Images / Audio / Video / Long Text Data is restricted by Parental Controls.

‘I'm not a bad slime, you know!’
It looks at you as if it wants to become your friend...
‘Hot panini! You have feelings for me!?’
But some mysterious force appears to be blocking it!
But the enemy blocks the way!
‘I will grant unto thee dominion over half this world!’

‘Can I interest you in ze...'ow can I say? Puff-puff?
It feels soooo good!’
And thus was a legend born...
No reply. It's just a corpse.

‘Alas, your adventure log appears
to have been lost for all eternity...’
‘Now come! Come to me, and show me how beautifully you die!’

When you wish to land, simply descend toward the ground. You may set down anywhere your shadow is clearly visible by pressing the B button.
